name: Bill's Bar & Burger
address: 16 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA

Bills Bar and Burger was an excellent experience! From the moment we walked in, the service was top notch. A special thank you to Victoria, who is a tremendous manager and made sure everything ran smoothly with such professionalism and kindness. Our waiter, Nelkin, was also awesomeâ€”attentive, friendly, and really made us feel taken care of. The food was delicious, and the overall vibe was perfect for a great night out. Definitely recommend this spot if youâ€™re looking for great food and even better service!

Greek restaurant. The atmosphere was lively and nice menu. Large portions. We tried the Greek salad and fish and chips. We shared and were full. Play nice local beers on tap. Best selection of themed cocktails. I recommend

Busy and vibrant restaurant with plenty of customers being in the middle of NYC during lunch time.

Service was efficient and friendly. For starters we had the nachos and it was freshly made with good topping of cheese, meat and jalapenos.

The milkshakes are so rich and sweet, I'd treat it as if it was a dessert than a beverage! The burgers were fantastic, great sized meat patties, fresh vegetables especially the well brined pickles.

Solid place for a burger fix with good portion sizes, albeit be ready for NY tourists / city centre prices.

Pretty good burgers. Fries were average. Onion rings we did like, crispy and tasty!  Loved my orangesicle shake. Cheese cake was pretty good too. Service was decent and efficient. Would definitely come back

We stopped at Billâ€™s Bar & Burger for a casual bite and were definitely impressed by the flavorâ€”but a bit less thrilled by the volume and prices.

We ordered the Cookies & Dreams milkshake (decadent and dreamy!), The Melt sandwich, plus onion rings and fries. The food was delicious and satisfying, classic comfort with a gourmet twist. That said, the prices felt a little extravagant for whatâ€™s essentially burgers and shakesâ€”but hey, itâ€™s New York.

Our server, Salin, was absolutely fantasticâ€”friendly, attentive, and patient, even when the restaurant got busy. The vibe inside was laid-back and fun, but the music was so loud, we could barely hear each other while sitting side by side. It made conversation tough, which took away from the chill dining experience a bit.

Great spot if youâ€™re craving a juicy burger and a monster milkshakeâ€”just bring your appetite and maybe some earplugs.

The food and atmosphere were great.

The service was good until we met a waiter who treated us badly. We ordered two burgers, one with meat and one vegetarian option so we'd prefer to know which one is which. He brought us our food and we didn't hear what he was asking us (probably which burger is for who) so we kindly asked if he could repeat. He just rolled his eyes and he just left the food without telling us which burger is vegetarian and which is not. It gave us really unpleasant impression.

The food itself was great, both burgers were tasty. Blue moon belgian white (a beer from a tap) was also great and we recommend it.

Atmosphere was almost like in those bars in americans movies where they play sport on TV (and there was TV with sport playing).
Food was really good,  the waiter was attentive and friendly,  service impeccable - which is now a rare thing in NYC - it was not expensive. I definitely recommend.

Had the Big Mammoo and the Big Cat with a side of sweet potato fries. Really big burgers with great flavors and the fries came hot and crispy. Definitely did not disappoint. The place can get crowded and really loud. Especially after work hours.

â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ for Billâ€™s Bar & Burger just off Fifth Avenue in NYC. Exceptional food, exceptional service, and surprisingly reasonable prices given the location. Our server Daniel was phenomenal. He was attentive, quick, and friendly without being fake or overbearing. The burgers were cooked perfectly. The fries were crispy. Everything came out fast despite the lunch rush.

The place has that rare combination of laid-back vibe with top-tier quality. Tables were clean. Staff worked like a team. Even the music was dialed in just right. In a city where you usually overpay for mediocre, Billâ€™s delivers the opposite.

This is the kind of spot you stumble into once and then make a point to come back to every time you are in the area. Highly recommend.
Very fast service . Polite and friendly server . Food was just ok. Not really special . I liked to have chunkier burger. Atmosphere was nice , seats a bit too close to each other .
The service wasn't fantastic but the burgers sure were good. It's a little on the pricey side, but that's to be expected in NYC. The cheese fries were excellent! The location is great also.

The name of the burger escapes me but it did have guacamole in it with a side of sweet potato fries made it the best I've ever had!
Arrived at lunch time busy enough but enough space for many more!
A very happy find by chance!
If had to find some fault the restroom was limited  but no long que!

I have been there a couple of times before, usually after work with friends. Depends on the day and time, place can be busy. The service is good and friendly. The food is very tasty. Specially enjoyed  small sliders, sweet potato fries, warm chips, and guacamole.  Margherita was great to ğŸ˜Š

Unbelievable restaurant, amazing food, great staff, super fast service.  We ordered  the Ultimate Burger, Fish and chips, Kids chicken tenders and everything was cooked to perfection.  And to top it off we tried the caramel shake.  Wow!
Highly recommended.

Made a reservation for 6pm last night & they were able to seat us about 30 minutes early. This place got crowded quick! Very very loud & busy! The booth we were in was a little tight. The food was delicious though & our waiter was great. The shakes, pretzels & burgers didnâ€™t disappoint. The fries however, tasted exactly like McDonaldâ€™s & were a little soggy / cool. A member of my family cannot go up the stairs so we asked if there was an elevator. They did have one but it wasnâ€™t very convenient & a little confusing to get to. It drops you off in the corner of the restaurant.

We passed by Bill's Bar & Burger several times, and as a burger lover, I was curious. However, I initially thought that being in the city center, right across from Rockefeller Center, it would cater mostly to tourists. One day, we decided to give it a try, and Iâ€™m so glad we did!
All three of us ordered different burgers, and we were all thrilled with our choices. The burgers were fresh, juicy, and cooked to perfection. We didn't try anything else on the menu, but I can confidently recommend their burgers. If youâ€™re in the area, definitely stop by for a delicious meal!

Les burgers sont vraiment trÃ¨s bons et les accompagnements frites et patates douces Ã©galement ! Les oignons rings sont trop cuits voir recuits et pas savoureux, c'est bien dommage. Le service est rapide mais pas accueillant du tout. Les toilettes manquent de propretÃ©. Je n'ai pas apprÃ©ciÃ© de manger dans leurs assiettes avec le papier et leurs nappes sales,  je ne trouve pas cela hygiÃ©nique. L'addition reste Ã©levÃ©e pour ce type d'Ã©tablissement.

Reservamos horas antes por internet. Fue llegar y sentarnos sin esperar. Restaurante tipico americano, con hamburguesas enormes y sus ricos batidos. Todo estaba buenisimo, las hamburguesas las patatasâ€¦ y tuvimos suerte en que la atencion de nuestra camarera fue muy buena.

Ottima Burgheria con ampia scelta. Locale adatto a famiglie con bambini. Personale gentilissimo a parte la signorina alla reception. MenÃ¹ kids con hamburger sia di carne che di pollo a soli 10 dollari. Gli hamburger sono davvero buoni.

De eerste keer spontaan langs gelopen op de dag van aankomst in nee York . En hierdoor nog twee x gegeten . Wij hebben drie keer de salade gegeten . Onze dochter 3x verschillende broodjes en tien we er de derde keer met onze vrienden zaten , namen zij oa  de toren van meerder hamburgers . Ook toen heerlijk gegeten .

Twee x hier avond eten gegeten en 1 x voor de lunch . Het is ons erg goed bevallen , prijs kwaliteit .  De relaxte sfeer al was de laatste keer iets rumoeriger maar dat kwam door de groep dit naast ons zat .

Nice place to pop in and get a good bite to eat and be close to so many things. Got the South of the burger and fish and chips. Meat needed seasoning, but was a good combo with everything on it. Fish and chips was OK, the fish needed to be cooked a little slower, but overall was a good meal for a decent price. Atmosphere in the place is pretty cool, go check out this place.

Place is realy nice, looks good and its big. Food - decent, but nothing special, I had better burgers in NY. Shake was realy nice, full of flavors. Service - it was really just okeish, not in standard of NY service that I've seen in other restaurants. Waitress was maybe tired, hard to tell.
Very cool place and good service even when it's crowded. Missed 5 stars as the burger was not proper warm when served. But the foods good as well. Recommended.
A must! All the plated are delicious! Burgers super, starters also, especially the buffalo wings. Their Bills tap beer is nice!

La comida muy buena y tamaÃ±o de los platos muy bien, calidad precio muy bien, lo recomiendo.
Todo por 72$
This place is awesome! Great food and service! Save room for a milkshake! The onion rings and fries are great. Loved the hot chicken sandwich.

Excelente restaurante puramente americano! La experiencia fue fantÃ¡stica! Desde el entrante hasta el postre todo estaba increÃ­blemente rico! MenciÃ³n especial las hamburguesas que eran de 10! Un restaurante con muy buen ambiente y servicio rÃ¡pido! La Ãºnica pega es que el baÃ±o es para una sola persona y suele haber cola por lo que toca esperar. En definitiva, un sitio imprescindible al que dejarse caer si estÃ¡s en Manhattan!

Super leckere Burger in der NÃ¤he vom Top of the Rock. Wir waren bei unserem NY Aufenthalt hier 2x essen. Das Ambiente ist toll und die Mitarbeiterinnen nett und sehr aufmerksam. Preis-Leistung ist fÃ¼r NY richtig gut. Absolute Empfehlung.

My sister and I came here after my shift at work. We ordered the Bâ€™s sliders which came with fries and onion rings, and that was honestly enough for two.

The sliders were large but a little plain with just pickles and cheese. The patties themselves were delicious though, I feel like I have to come back and try a full burger. The shake was really great and the beer selection has nice offerings from both coasts.

This is a real gem!  The service is fast and friendly.  The menu will make your mouth water.  Then the food arrives!  Very impressed.  Fresh and oh, so yummy!!  The Smores Milkshake is insane!!  A must try.  All of the food ordered by our table was excellent! Fresh and oozing with flavor.  The prices are extremely fair for the location.  We were pleasantly surprised by this restaurant!
Great spot for drinks and chill. Cool location. Sat at the bar and enjoyed relaxing for a few. Great drinks ğŸ¥ƒğŸ¹

We recommend the Bills Burger! The environment is great, but waiters take a bit of time to handle the order; donâ€™t go if youâ€™re in a hurry. But you can relax and enjoy if you have a bit of time! :) Iâ€™m looking forward to go back and try a different Burguer there

Top notch and tasty burger joint in mid Town!  I believe this to be a chain, but one I am very happy to have visited.   Great, flavorful burgers with lots of additional options to kick the up a notch.   The mozzarella sticks were delicious, and shakes were really special.  If it was in my neighborhood, I would visit regularly.

Had a blast at Bills Bar & Burger. I visited during new year week and it was pretty crowded. Glad they had a full service bar and i slipped right in as i went there by myself.

The milkshakes and burgers were awesome. The sweet potato fries were out of the world. I ordered their custom made Veggie burger patty and it was amazing. I don't eat meat but if you are a meat lover, this is your burger point right in the heart of new york.

I had a great experience going with my family. The menu is diverse and the food portion is big. I recommend having the classic cheese burger with fries and a side of onion rings. The chicken tenders is very fresh & tasty. The sliders taste amazing and it comes with a good portion of Three pieces. I highly recommend going with a big crowd you will have a great experience.
